availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin M. Burdett (Lancaster, Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Lancaster, Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Nelson Burdett and America Letcher Samuel Burdett. Household owned twenty-eight enslaved persons in Garrard County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Lancaster, Garrard County, Kentucky, in 1860. Household owned seventeen enslaved persons in Garrard County in 1860. Resident of Gerrard County in 1863. Farmer in Garrard County in 1864. Attorney in Garrard County in 1864.
